data.name: Acoustic Guitar
data.description: A playable acoustic guitar used to attract ARC's attention and impress other Raiders.

data.name: Adrenaline Shot
data.description: A serum that fully restores stamina and temporarily increases stamina regeneration

data.name: Advanced ARC Powercell
data.description: Very valuable resource that drops from certain ARC enemies

data.name: Advanced Electrical Components
data.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials.
data.flavor_text: Used to craft: Tactical Mk. 3 (Defensive), Combat Mk. 3 (Flanking), Combat Mk. 3 (Aggressive), Looting Mk. 3 (Cautious), Tactical Mk. 3 (Healing)

data.name: Advanced Mechanical Components
data.description: Mostly used to craft advanced weapons. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Agave
data.description: A piece of an agave leaf. Can be used to regain a small amount of health.

data.name: Agave Juice
data.description: A concoction that temporarily increases stamina regeneration, at a small initial cost to health.

data.name: Air Freshener
data.description: May be worth a few coins.

data.name: Alarm Clock
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Alien Duck
data.description: A long, long way from home.
data.flavor_text: Can be thrown to create noise.

data.name: Ancient Fort Security Code
data.description: Temporary security code to unlock the main gate.
data.flavor_text: Can only be used during Locked Gate

data.name: Angled Grip I
data.description: Slightly reduces horizontal recoil.

data.flavor_text: 20% Reduced Horizontal Recoil

data.name: Angled Grip II
data.description: Moderately reduces horizontal recoil.
data.flavor_text: 30% Reduced Horizontal Recoil

data.description: Lets you craft an Angled Grip II

data.name: Angled Grip III
data.description: Significantly reduces horizontal recoil.

stat_block.compatibleWeapons: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Arpeggio, II toro, Venator, Bettina, Bobcat, Tempest, Vulcano, Aphelion

data.flavor_text: 40% Reduced Horizontal Recoil - 30% Reduced ADS Speed

data.name: Angled Grip III Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an Angled Grip III

data.name: Antiseptic
data.description: Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into chemicals.

data.name: Anvil Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an Anvil - Has high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

data.name: Anvil I
data.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.
data.flavor_text: Very effective against ARC armor plating.

data.name: Anvil II
data.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.
data.flavor_text: Very effective against ARC armor plating.

data.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.
data.flavor_text: Very effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Anvil IV
data.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

data.description: Compatible with: Anvil  - Tech mod for the Anvil that replaces its bullets with ones that split into 4 weaker projectiles.

data.name: Apricot
data.description: A sun ripe apricot. Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies and activities. Can be recycled into fabric.

data.description: A 3-round burst assault rifle with decent damage output and accuracy.

data.description: A 3-round burst assault rifle with decent damage output and accuracy.

data.description: Has slow fire rate and high damage output.

data.description: Has slow fire rate and high damage output.

data.description: Maintain at least Rookie III rank in trials until season end.

data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Burnt-Out Candles
data.description: After the grid fell candles became the preferred source of light for many. Unlike electricity, a good old candle will never fail you. Unless it's windy. Or raining. Or...

data.name: Camera Lens
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Candleberries
data.description: A waxy berry that grows only during a small window each year. People have depended on them to make candles, foods and medicine for ages.

data.name: Candle Holder
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Canister
data.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into plastic.

data.name: Cans (Backpack Attachment)
data.description: A set of cans that are a backpack attachment from the quest Safe Passage.

data.name: Cat Bed
data.description: At least a tiny bit more comfortable than your face.

data.name: Cheer (Emote)
data.description: Cheer Emote - Quest reward from The Right Tool

data.name: Chemicals
data.description: Used to craft medical supplies, explosives, and utility items.

data.name: Coffee Pot
data.description: The power to face a new day, one drip at a time.

data.name: Combat Mk. 1
data.description: Basic combat augment. Supports stronger shields, but with limited backpack capacity and Quick Use slots.

data.name: Combat Mk. 2
data.description: A Combat augment is more focused on maneuverability than absorbing damage.
data.flavor_text: Restores 1 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken, the effect is paused for 30 seconds.

data.name: Combat Mk. 3 (Aggressive)
data.description: An improved version of the Combat II augment. Supports more shield types, and comes with extra space for grenades.
data.flavor_text: Restores 2 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken, the effect is paused for 30 seconds.

data.name: Combat Mk.3 (Aggressive) Blueprint
data.description: An improved version of the Combat II augment. Supports more shield types and comes with extra space for grenades

data.name: Combat Mk.3 (Flanking)
data.description: A Combat augment more focused on maneuverability than absorbing damage.
data.flavor_text: Stowed or unequipped Pistols and Hand Cannon are 33% faster to equip.

data.name: Combat Mk. 3 (Flanking) Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Combat Mk. 3 (Flanking)

data.name: Comet Igniter
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina

data.description: Light bullets used mainly with SMGs and light handguns. Such as Kettle, Stitcher, Burletta, Hairpin and Bobcat.

data.description: A grenade that pops a thick but small smoke cloud on impact, blocking visibility from ARC and other Raiders.

data.name: Looting Mk. 1
data.description: Basic looting augment. More backpack slots and weight capacity, but low defensive and tactical capability.

data.name: Looting Mk. 2
data.description: Significantly increases looting potential; adds slots for trinkets.
data.flavor_text: Automatically throws off attached Ticks after 1s.

data.name: Looting MK. 3 (Cautious)
data.description: A looting augment that swaps some carry capacity to increase survivability.
data.flavor_text: Upon Shield break, automatically administers a weak Adrenaline Shot. Has a fixed cooldown.

data.name: Looting MK. 3 (Safekeeper)
data.description: A looting augment that trades weight and utility for increased looting potential.
data.flavor_text: A Safe Pocket that allows any item to be stored.

data.name: Looting MK. 3 (Safekeeper) Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft the Looting Mk. 3 (Safekeeper) Augment.

data.name: Looting MK. 3 (Survivor)
data.description: A heavy-duty pack mule augment. Large weight capacity and large backpack space.
data.flavor_text: While downed and stationary, health regenerates up to 75% of max downed health.

data.name: Looting MK. 3 (Survivor) Blueprint
data.description: A heavy-duty pack mule augment. Large weight capacity and large backpack space.

data.name: Tactical Mk. 1
data.description: Basic tactical augment. More Quick Use slots for more tactical choice, but limited survivability and slightly lower looting potential.

data.name: Tactical Mk. 2
data.description: Adds more backpack space and an extra utility item slot.
data.flavor_text: Upon Shield break, deploys a small smoke grenade. Has a fixed cooldown.

data.name: Tactical Mk.3 (Defensive)
data.description: A defence-focused augment for keeping shields topped up.
data.flavor_text: Allows Shield Rechargers to be used while running.

data.name: Tactical MK.3 (Defensive) Blueprint
data.description: a defense-focused augment for keeping Shields topped up

data.name: Tactical Mk. 3 (Healing)
data.description: A healing-focused augment which adds extra slots for healing items.
data.flavor_text: When revived from being downed, releases a healing cloud that restores 20 health over 10 seconds. Has a 30-second cooldown.

data.name: Tactical MK.3 (Healing) Blueprint
data.description: A healing-focused augment which adds extra slots for healing items.

data.name: Tactical MK. 3 (Revival)
data.description: A tactical augment focused on utility over defense and looting.
data.flavor_text: Restores 1 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken, the effect is paused for 30 seconds.

data.description: Lets you craft Tactical MK. 3 (Revival) Blueprint.
